name: The Wildlands
description:
An interactive storyworld by Sasha Fenn, Chris Conley, and George Dawson.

Made in less than 48 hours, using the SweepWeave development system, for the 2022 GMTK GameJam.

You play as a clairvoyant character taking a journey to become a Seer. Do you embrace you destiny and struggle against the chaotic forces of the wilderness, or do you join those who would willingly give up control?
